title: 2.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
Students in a certain college can appear for an exam only if their attendance is more than 75%. Write a program that accomplishes the following.
● Takes the following input from the user:
○ Name of the student
○ Total number of classes held
○ Total number of classes attended
● Displays the following output:
○ Percentage of attendance
○ Allowed to appear for exams or not
In case a student has low attendance due to a medical reason, allow the student to appear for the exam. Take the input ( 'Y' or 'N' ) from the user for having a valid medical reason and print accordingly.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

output = 11
